And the LORD<S>3068</S> spake<S>1696</S> unto Moses<S>4872</S>, saying<S>559</S>,
On the first<S>7223</S> day<S>3117</S> of the first<S>259</S> month<S>2320</S> shalt thou set up<S>6965</S> the tabernacle<S>4908</S> of the tent<S>168</S> of the congregation<S>4150</S>.
And thou shalt put<S>7760</S> therein<S>8033</S> the ark<S>727</S> of the testimony<S>5715</S>, and cover<S>5526</S> the ark<S>727</S> with the vail<S>6532</S>.
And thou shalt bring<S>935</S> in the table<S>7979</S>, and set in order<S>6186</S> the things that are to be set in order<S>6187</S> upon it; and thou shalt bring<S>935</S> in the candlestick<S>4501</S>, and light<S>5927</S> the lamps<S>5216</S> thereof. <sup>the things: Heb. the order thereof</sup>
And thou shalt set<S>5414</S> the altar<S>4196</S> of gold<S>2091</S> for the incense<S>7004</S> before<S>6440</S> the ark<S>727</S> of the testimony<S>5715</S>, and put<S>7760</S> the hanging<S>4539</S> of the door<S>6607</S> to the tabernacle<S>4908</S>.
And thou shalt set<S>5414</S> the altar<S>4196</S> of the burnt offering<S>5930</S> before<S>6440</S> the door<S>6607</S> of the tabernacle<S>4908</S> of the tent<S>168</S> of the congregation<S>4150</S>.
And thou shalt set<S>5414</S> the laver<S>3595</S> between the tent<S>168</S> of the congregation<S>4150</S> and the altar<S>4196</S>, and shalt put<S>5414</S> water<S>4325</S> therein.
And thou shalt set up<S>7760</S> the court<S>2691</S> round about<S>5439</S>, and hang up<S>5414</S> the hanging<S>4539</S> at the court<S>2691</S> gate<S>8179</S>.
And thou shalt take<S>3947</S> the anointing<S>4888</S> oil<S>8081</S>, and anoint<S>4886</S> the tabernacle<S>4908</S>, and all that is therein, and shalt hallow<S>6942</S> it, and all the vessels<S>3627</S> thereof: and it shall be holy<S>6944</S>.
And thou shalt anoint<S>4886</S> the altar<S>4196</S> of the burnt offering<S>5930</S>, and all his vessels<S>3627</S>, and sanctify<S>6942</S> the altar<S>4196</S>: and it shall be an altar<S>4196</S> most<S>6944</S> holy<S>6944</S>. <sup>most holy: Heb. holiness of holinesses</sup>
And thou shalt anoint<S>4886</S> the laver<S>3595</S> and his foot<S>3653</S>, and sanctify<S>6942</S> it.
And thou shalt bring<S>7126</S> Aaron<S>175</S> and his sons<S>1121</S> unto the door<S>6607</S> of the tabernacle<S>168</S> of the congregation<S>4150</S>, and wash<S>7364</S> them with water<S>4325</S>.
And thou shalt put<S>3847</S> upon Aaron<S>175</S> the holy<S>6944</S> garments<S>899</S>, and anoint<S>4886</S> him, and sanctify<S>6942</S> him; that he may minister unto me in the priest's office<S>3547</S>.
And thou shalt bring<S>7126</S> his sons<S>1121</S>, and clothe<S>3847</S> them with coats<S>3801</S>:
And thou shalt anoint<S>4886</S> them, as thou didst anoint<S>4886</S> their father<S>1</S>, that they may minister unto me in the priest's office<S>3547</S>: for their anointing<S>4888</S> shall surely be an everlasting<S>5769</S> priesthood<S>3550</S> throughout their generations<S>1755</S>.
Thus did<S>6213</S> Moses<S>4872</S>: according to all that the LORD<S>3068</S> commanded<S>6680</S> him, so did<S>6213</S> he.
And it came to pass in the first<S>7223</S> month<S>2320</S> in the second<S>8145</S> year<S>8141</S>, on the first<S>259</S> day of the month<S>2320</S>, that the tabernacle<S>4908</S> was reared up<S>6965</S>.
And Moses<S>4872</S> reared up<S>6965</S> the tabernacle<S>4908</S>, and fastened<S>5414</S> his sockets<S>134</S>, and set up<S>7760</S> the boards<S>7175</S> thereof, and put<S>5414</S> in the bars<S>1280</S> thereof, and reared up<S>6965</S> his pillars<S>5982</S>.
And he spread abroad<S>6566</S> the tent<S>168</S> over the tabernacle<S>4908</S>, and put<S>7760</S> the covering<S>4372</S> of the tent<S>168</S> above<S>4605</S> upon it; as the LORD<S>3068</S> commanded<S>6680</S> Moses<S>4872</S>.
And he took<S>3947</S> and put<S>5414</S> the testimony<S>5715</S> into the ark<S>727</S>, and set<S>7760</S> the staves<S>905</S> on the ark<S>727</S>, and put<S>5414</S> the mercy seat<S>3727</S> above<S>4605</S> upon the ark<S>727</S>:
And he brought<S>935</S> the ark<S>727</S> into the tabernacle<S>4908</S>, and set up<S>7760</S> the vail<S>6532</S> of the covering<S>4539</S>, and covered<S>5526</S> the ark<S>727</S> of the testimony<S>5715</S>; as the LORD<S>3068</S> commanded<S>6680</S> Moses<S>4872</S>.
And he put<S>5414</S> the table<S>7979</S> in the tent<S>168</S> of the congregation<S>4150</S>, upon the side<S>3409</S> of the tabernacle<S>4908</S> northward<S>6828</S>, without<S>2351</S> the vail<S>6532</S>.
And he set<S>6187</S> the bread<S>3899</S> in order<S>6186</S> upon it before<S>6440</S> the LORD<S>3068</S>; as the LORD<S>3068</S> had commanded<S>6680</S> Moses<S>4872</S>.
And he put<S>7760</S> the candlestick<S>4501</S> in the tent<S>168</S> of the congregation<S>4150</S>, over against<S>5227</S> the table<S>7979</S>, on the side<S>3409</S> of the tabernacle<S>4908</S> southward<S>5045</S>.
And he lighted<S>5927</S> the lamps<S>5216</S> before<S>6440</S> the LORD<S>3068</S>; as the LORD<S>3068</S> commanded<S>6680</S> Moses<S>4872</S>.
And he put<S>7760</S> the golden<S>2091</S> altar<S>4196</S> in the tent<S>168</S> of the congregation<S>4150</S> before<S>6440</S> the vail<S>6532</S>:
And he burnt<S>6999</S> sweet<S>5561</S> incense<S>7004</S> thereon; as the LORD<S>3068</S> commanded<S>6680</S> Moses<S>4872</S>.
And he set up<S>7760</S> the hanging<S>4539</S> at the door<S>6607</S> of the tabernacle<S>4908</S>.
And he put<S>7760</S> the altar<S>4196</S> of burnt offering<S>5930</S> by the door<S>6607</S> of the tabernacle<S>4908</S> of the tent<S>168</S> of the congregation<S>4150</S>, and offered<S>5927</S> upon it the burnt offering<S>5930</S> and the meat offering<S>4503</S>; as the LORD<S>3068</S> commanded<S>6680</S> Moses<S>4872</S>.
And he set<S>7760</S> the laver<S>3595</S> between the tent<S>168</S> of the congregation<S>4150</S> and the altar<S>4196</S>, and put<S>5414</S> water<S>4325</S> there, to wash<S>7364</S> withal.
And Moses<S>4872</S> and Aaron<S>175</S> and his sons<S>1121</S> washed<S>7364</S> their hands<S>3027</S> and their feet<S>7272</S> thereat:
When they went<S>935</S> into the tent<S>168</S> of the congregation<S>4150</S>, and when they came near<S>7126</S> unto the altar<S>4196</S>, they washed<S>7364</S>; as the LORD<S>3068</S> commanded<S>6680</S> Moses<S>4872</S>.
And he reared up<S>6965</S> the court<S>2691</S> round about<S>5439</S> the tabernacle<S>4908</S> and the altar<S>4196</S>, and set up<S>5414</S> the hanging<S>4539</S> of the court<S>2691</S> gate<S>8179</S>. So Moses<S>4872</S> finished<S>3615</S> the work<S>4399</S>.
Then a cloud<S>6051</S> covered<S>3680</S> the tent<S>168</S> of the congregation<S>4150</S>, and the glory<S>3519</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S> filled<S>4390</S> the tabernacle<S>4908</S>.
And Moses<S>4872</S> was not able<S>3201</S> to enter<S>935</S> into the tent<S>168</S> of the congregation<S>4150</S>, because the cloud<S>6051</S> abode<S>7931</S> thereon, and the glory<S>3519</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S> filled<S>4390</S> the tabernacle<S>4908</S>.
And when the cloud<S>6051</S> was taken up<S>5927</S> from<S>5921</S> over the tabernacle<S>4908</S>, the children<S>1121</S> of Israel<S>3478</S> went onward<S>5265</S> in all their journeys<S>4550</S>: <sup>went onward: Heb. journeyed</sup>
But if the cloud<S>6051</S> were not taken up<S>5927</S>, then they journeyed<S>5265</S> not till the day<S>3117</S> that it was taken up<S>5927</S>.
For the cloud<S>6051</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S> was upon the tabernacle<S>4908</S> by day<S>3119</S>, and fire<S>784</S> was on it by night<S>3915</S>, in the sight<S>5869</S> of all the house<S>1004</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>, throughout all their journeys<S>4550</S>.
